G

getCPUFrequencyLevels() - Method in class cpu.CPUMonitor
Returns an array that contains the CPU frequency levels supported in your computer system.
getCPULoad() - Method in class cpu.CPUMonitor
Returns the current percentage of CPU utilization in your computer.
getcurrentCPUFrequencyLevels() - Method in class cpu.CPUMonitor
Returns an array of size "n" with the frequencies in use for each of the "n" CPUs in your computer.
getNumberOfCPUs() - Method in class cpu.CPUMonitor
Returns the total number of CPUs that exist in your computer.
getPowerCPUIdle() - Method in class cpu.CPUEnergyMeter
Generate a value that represents the current system power.
getPowerCPUInUse() - Method in class cpu.CPUEnergyMeter
Generates a matrix m x n of the average power consumption by CPU.
getPowerCPUInUse(int) - Method in class cpu.CPUEnergyMeter
Generates a matrix m x n of the average power consumption by CPU.
getPowerMaximumCPUInUse() - Method in class cpu.CPUEnergyMeter
Generates an array of size n where each value represents the average CPU power when using all CPUs in the system with each of the n frequencies supported.
